text: A Man for All Seasons is a play by Robert Bolt about the life of Sir Thomas More that was first put on in 1960. It was made into a movie in 1966 that won the Best Picture Academy Award that year. It was also made into a TV movie in 1988. Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:Plays based on English history Category:1960s plays Category:1960 works
title: A Man for All Seasons
